Title: Relates to admissibility of evidence of a victim's sexual conduct, sexual predisposition, or manner of dress
Summary: Prohibits the admissibility of evidence of a victim's sexual conduct, sexual predisposition, or manner of dress in civil actions or proceedings; provides limited exceptions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to admissibility of evidence of a victim's sexual conduct, sexual predisposition, or manner of dress
